Package com.rs.seagull.emulator.api

Interface Screen

All Superinterfaces:
BareScreen, Defined
public interface Screen extends BareScreen, Defined
A Screen represents a host screen. Next to being a rectangular shape, as defined by BareScreen, it also has host application definitions, as defined by Defined.
